name: Pax
headline: AI Broker for Import Tax Refunds
description:
Pax uses AI to automate import tax refunds (aka duty drawback) for retailers and manufacturers. We launched 4 weeks ago and have ~$200K in contracts.

Each year, 80% of eligible refunds—equivalent to $15B—go unclaimed. Pax is the first AI-powered broker helping brands under $50M reclaim 3-5% of their revenue. Our algorithms generate 15% more refunds than the industry leader and reduce processing time by 99% with AI.

We are two technical founders: Penny got her PhD from MIT and, and was a former research scientist at Amazon & Flexport, where I encountered the problem firsthand. Chris is a second-time founder and former software engineer at Amazon, Brex, and TikTok.

founders.name: Penny Chen, Co-Founder / CEO
founders.description: Penny is the Co-Founder and CEO of Pax AI. She has designed and built algorithms for pricing, forecasting, fulfillment, and capacity planning to optimize workflows, costs, and quality across logistics and supply chain. She has extensive experience driving projects at MIT, Flexport, and Amazon, addressing real-world problems through a mixture of AI/ML, statistics, and optimization.

founders.name: Chris Le, Founder
founders.description:
Chris is the Co-Founder and CTO of Pax AI.

Before Pax AI, Chris worked on scaling up Amazon's supply chain network where he was introduced to the logistics space. After Amazon, Chris built the TikTok E-Commerce merchant systems  from 0-1 and took that learning to build Kyros, a live streaming e-commerce platform in Singapore. Most recently, Chris built the financial rewards and billing systems at Brex.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Pax**

Pax is an innovative startup on a mission to become the leading AI broker for import tax refunds, also known as duty drawbacks. Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Pax has quickly positioned itself as a game-changer in the world of financial reclamation for retailers and manufacturers, particularly those with annual revenues under $50 million.

**The Problem They Solve**

Each year, there's a staggering $15 billion worth of eligible refunds that go unclaimed, with estimates suggesting that as much as 80% of duty drawbacks are overlooked. This represents a significant revenue loss for businesses. Pax addresses this issue head-on, offering businesses an automated solution that can help them reclaim 3-5% of their revenue by tapping into these unclaimed funds.

**What Makes Pax Unique?**

- **AI-Powered Technology:** Pax uses sophisticated algorithms designed to identify the maximum recoverable duties, which reportedly generate 15% more refunds than the current industry leader. This advanced technology cuts processing times down by a remarkable 99%, allowing businesses to get their money back faster and more efficiently than ever before.
  
- **Expert Founders:** The founding team consists of two tech-savvy individuals. Penny, who holds a PhD from MIT, has experience as a research scientist at both Amazon and Flexport, where she witnessed the inefficiencies in duty drawback processes firsthand. Chris, a second-time founder and former software engineer for tech giants like Amazon, Brex, and TikTok, complements her expertise.

**Current Status and Future Plans**

In just four weeks since launching, Pax has secured nearly $200,000 in contracts, illustrating strong demand for their service. This promising start, combined with their unique offering and the backing of Y Combinator, puts Pax in a favorable position for growth in the fast-paced tech and finance landscape.

**Get Involved**

If you're a retailer or manufacturer looking to streamline your duty drawback process, Pax offers free consultations. You can learn more about their innovative solutions by visiting their website at [paxai.com](https://paxai.com/).

In summary, Pax is positioned to redefine how businesses approach import tax refunds, leveraging AI to unlock significant revenue opportunities while saving time and effort. With a strong foundation and a clear vision, they might just be the company that transforms the duty drawback landscape.
